p: Moreover, plants showing no evidence of activity in our study may be worth studying further since the plants studied were tested at 1â€‰mg/mL, and many crude extracts may only show activity at significantly higher concentrations. Also, the activity of the extract is affected by spatiotemporal variation, the plant part taken for screening purposes, and the environmental conditions under which the plant material was harvested. These factors may also explain some of our negative results or discrepancies with earlier reports.
